title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Add pasta to pan and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Heat the vegetable oil and butter.
Add the tikka masala paste and peppers,
Remove the lid, stir through the mango chutney
Scatter the rest with coriander leaves and serve with basmati rice and naan bread.
